mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} ORDER BY MEM_NO

SELECT M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_ID, M.NICKNAME, LEV.LEVEL_NO, LEV.LEVEL_NAME, R.SCORE_BEST, R.SCORE_TOTAL, R.SCORE_COUNT, R.SCORE_AVG, R.SCORE_LAST, R.PLAYED_LAST_DATE, R.COMBO, R.CLEAR_TIME FROM GAME_RANKING R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN GAME_LEVEL LEV ON (R.LEVEL_NO = LEV.LEVEL_NO) WHERE M.MEM_NO = #{mem_no} ORDER BY M.MEM_NO, LEV.LEVEL_NO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT L.SCORE AS score, L.START_TIME AS startTime, L.END_TIME AS endTime, L.MEM_NO AS memNo, L.LEVEL_NO AS levelNo, L.COMBO AS combo, L.CLEAR_TIME AS clearTime FROM GAME_LOG L WHERE L.MEM_NO = #{mem_no} ORDER BY L.END_TIME DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
